listCommands.name: listCommands
listCommands.description: List all available commands from vscode or its extensions. You can use these commands to achieve diverse functions.

filterKey.description: An optional filter key. If provided, only commands that contain this key in their name will be listed.

executeCommand.name: executeCommand
executeCommand.description: Execute a specified command of vscode or its extensions. You can use this function to achieve diverse functions

commandId.description: The identifier of the command to be executed.
